Package eg.projects

Interface ProjectCommands

All Superinterfaces:
Configurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericProject, HtmlProject, JavaProject, PerlProject, PythonProject, RProject
public interface ProjectCommands
extends Configurable
The interface that defines the commands to compile, run and build a project. The commands are optional but throw an exception if called although an overriding method is not present. The actions that call the commands are therefore enabled or disabled by enable(eg.ui.ProjectActionsUpdate).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void build()
    Creates a build of the project
    default void compile()
    Compiles source files
    void enable​(ProjectActionsUpdate update)
    Updates controls that invoke commands
    default void run()
    Runs the project using a main file defined by the project
    default void run​(java.lang.String filepath)
    Runs the project using the specified file

    Methods inherited from interface eg.projects.Configurable

    buildSettingsWindow, configure, executableDirName, isInProject, openSettingsWindow, projectName, projectPath, projectType, retrieve, setConfiguringAction, storeConfiguration, usesProjectFile
